divs: Sighting Detailsdriving on a dirt dark unlit road...noticed to my NW what I thought was a quick meteor flash of yellow and it lasted a few seconds and was gone. Shortly after, it reappeared further on a straight path without any cloud cover in the sky that night. I watched while driving and it disappeared again and did not see it for another few minutes while driving. It then reappeared about 5 minutes later on my NE side further past a tree line, but noticeable and as I watched it changed from one yellow light to two yellow lights in a row and then very quickly became 4 yellow lights and then it was gone.
Summary: yellow light - looked like a meteor without a tail at first glance
